pop3.label: TOP
pop3.docs: Header and Top few lines of message

pop3.label: RSET
pop3.docs: Undelete messages that marked for deletion

smtp.label: HELO
smtp.docs: It provides the identification of the sender.

smtp.label: MAIL
smtp.docs: It specifies the originator of the mail.

smtp.label: RCPT
smtp.docs: It specifies the recipient of mail.

smtp.label: DATA
smtp.docs: It specifies the beginning of the mail.

smtp.label: RSET
smtp.docs: It aborts the current mail transaction but the TCP connection remains open.

smtp.label: VRFY
smtp.docs: It is use to confirm or verify the user name.

smtp.label: TURN
smtp.docs: It reverses the role of sender and receiver.

smtp.label: EXPN
smtp.docs: It specifies the mailing list to be expanded.

smtp.label: HELP
smtp.docs: It send some specific docs to the system.

smtp.label: SEND
smtp.docs: It send mail to the terminal.

smtp.label: SOML
smtp.docs: It send mail to the terminal if possible; otherwise to mailbox.

smtp.label: SAML
smtp.docs: It send mail to the terminal and mailbox.
